DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify effect prophylactic entecavir HBsAg Positive lymphoma patient treat rituximab-based immunochemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Use Entecavir HBsAg Positive Lymphoma Patients Treated With Rituximab-based Immunochemotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: HBsAg Positive lymphoma patient treat entecavir receive rituximab-based immunochemotherapy . Entecavir 0.5mg daily administrate day 1 immunochemotherapy and/or chemotherapy 12 month complete immunochemotherapy and/or chemotherapy .
DOC.criteria: treatmentnaive patient Bcell lymphoma HBsAg positive baseline treat rituximabbased immunochemotherapy life expectancy 3 month young 18 year old HBsAg negative baseline pregnant lactating woman
